name: slag
content:
slag noun [U]
(WASTE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] waste material produced when coal is dug from the ground, or a substance produced by mixing chemicals with metal that has been heated until it is liquid in order to remove unwanted substances from it See also
slag heap mainly UK

slag noun [U]
(INSULT)
[ C ] UK slang offensive an offensive word for a woman who is thought to have a lot of sexual partners
